data.description: Modern, single-story 6BHK townhouse on a 30x50 feet plot with a large garden and a rooftop terrace designed as a bachelor pad. The design incorporates local building norms along with Vastu principles ensuring auspicious placement of rooms.

rooms.description: Entrance hall with built-in shoe rack, aligned with the North-West corner following Vastu guidelines.
Spacious living room with an open concept layout adjacent to the entrance hall. Large windows for natural light on the east side as per Vastu.
Modern kitchen integrated into the dining area, located in the south-eastern part of the ground floor to ensure balance and energy flow according to Vastu principles.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen with an indoor dining table. Natural lighting from east windows as per Vastu design.
Master bedroom designed for privacy, placed in the north-eastern corner ensuring positive energy and calm ambience following Vastu guidelines.
Secondary bedroom located next to master bedroom with sufficient personal space. Windows on east for auspicious light as per Vastu.
Tertiary bedroom designed for guests or future expansion. Positioned adjacent to the secondary bedroom ensuring harmony and balance.
Master bathroom attached to master bedroom with modern fixtures. Aligned properly as per Vastu guidelines.
Guest bathroom accessible from the living area and adjacent to one of the bedrooms. Designed for convenience.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented towards north, ensuring positive energy flow in keeping with Vastu principles.
Large windows on the east side for ample natural light and positive energy.
Windows placed on the west side to balance the interior ambience in accordance with Vastu norms.
Side windows ensuring ventilation and natural light from the south.

garden.description: Large garden area integrated into the ground floor layout extending to the west and south boundaries, promoting relaxation and connection with nature.

rooftop_terraces.description: Rooftop terrace designed for leisure and relaxation. Features comfortable seating and a small water feature enhancing Vastu elements of harmony.
